meanings.sent1: She misprogrammed the robot, causing it to move in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: He always double-checks his code to avoid misprogramming errors.
meanings.sent3: The misprogramming of the alarm system led to a comical situation where it went off randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her misprogramming of the GPS turned their road trip into a wild adventure.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misprogramming can be costly and time-consuming.

meanings.definition: The act of programming something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: Misprogramming can result in system malfunctions and errors.
meanings.sent2: The team identified the misprogramming in the software and worked to fix it.
meanings.sent3: The misprogramming of the vending machine made it dispense snacks at random times.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, misprogramming is a common challenge that developers face.
meanings.sent5: The company suffered financial losses due to misprogramming in their automated systems.
